NJET CARD GAME - DISTRIBUTION PACKAGE
====================================

This package contains executables for the Njet card game for both Mac and Windows platforms.

CONTENTS:
- Njet-Mac-App.app/     - Mac application bundle (double-click to run)
- Njet-Windows/         - Windows executable folder (run Njet-Windows.exe)
- README.txt           - This file

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
- Mac: macOS 10.13 or later
- Windows: Windows 10 or later (note: this was built on Mac so may require Windows compatibility layer)

INCLUDED FEATURES:
- Complete Njet card game implementation
- Background music (4 MP3 files included)
- Save/load game functionality
- Settings menu with music controls
- AI opponents with sophisticated strategy
- Full game tutorial
- Professional UI with vintage Soviet-era color scheme

HOW TO RUN:

MAC:
1. Double-click on "Njet-Mac-App.app"
2. If Mac asks about security, go to System Preferences > Security & Privacy and click "Open Anyway"

WINDOWS:
1. Navigate to the "Njet-Windows" folder
2. Double-click on "Njet-Windows" executable
3. If Windows shows a security warning, click "More info" then "Run anyway"

MUSIC FILES:
The game includes 4 background music tracks that will cycle automatically when music is enabled in settings.

TROUBLESHOOTING:
- If the game doesn't start, try running from Terminal/Command Prompt to see error messages
- Music requires audio drivers to be installed
- Game saves are stored in the same directory as the executable

GAME RULES:
The game implements the complete Njet card game rules as designed by Stefan Dorra.
Use the in-game tutorial for detailed instructions.

BUILD INFORMATION:
- Built with PyInstaller 6.14.1
- Python 3.13.4
- Pygame 2.6.1 for audio
- Tkinter for GUI
